alert.note: Alert for Bibb; Jefferson; Tuscaloosa (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued June 25 at 6:25PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 930 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central Alabama, including the following counties, Bibb, Jefferson and Tuscaloosa. * WHEN...Until 930 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 625 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This is causing urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Bessemer, Hueytown, Pleasant Grove, Lake View, Brookwood, Sylvan Springs, Vance, Woodstock, Maytown, North Johns, Abernant, Tannehill Ironworks State Park, North Bibb, Splash Adventure, Concord, Mercedes Benz Of Alabama, Weller, Bucksville, Caffee Junction and Green Pond.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Please report observed flooding to local emergency services or law enforcement and request they pass this information to the National Weather Service when you can do so safely.
